title: PPIs
description: Adds definition of Process Performance Indicators to BPMN 2.0

stencils.title: PPI
stencils.description: It computes the actual value of the measure and has an associated target value

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify elements of the ppi extension.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: The descriptive name of the PPI.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: This attribute is used to describe the element.

properties.title: Goals
properties.description: This attribute is used to establish strategic or operational goals.

properties.title: Target
properties.description: Restriction that the value of a PPI must fulfill

properties.title: Scope
properties.description: This attribute is used to indicate the subset of instances taken into account to calculate the PPI value.

properties.title: Responsible
properties.description: This attribute is used to describe the human resource in charge of the PPI.

properties.title: Informed
properties.description: This attribute is used to describe the human resource interested in the PPI.

properties.title: Comments
properties.description: This attribute is used for any additional information.

stencils.title: TimeMeasure
stencils.description: It measures the duration between two instants (start and end) in a process instance.

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify elements of the ppi extension.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: This attribute is used to describe the element.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: The descriptive name of the measure.

properties.title: Scale
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the measure domain (a set of values with defined properties).

properties.title: UnitOfMeasure
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the unit of measure.

properties.title: TimeMeasureType
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the type of timeMeasure, when it is defined over elements within a loop.

properties.title: SingleInstanceAggregationFunction
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the aggregation function applied if TimeMeasureType is cyclic.

stencils.title: CountMeasure
stencils.description: It counts the number of times a certain timeInstantCondition is met.

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify elements of the ppi extension.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: This attribute is used to describe the element.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: The descriptive name of the measure.

properties.title: Scale
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the measure domain (a set of values with defined properties).

properties.title: UnitOfMeasure
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the unit of measure.

stencils.title: StateConditionMeasure
stencils.description: It checks wether a flow element's instance is currently in execution (its statusor state).

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify elements of the ppi extension.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: This attribute is used to describe the element.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: The descriptive name of the measure.

properties.title: Scale
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the measure domain (a set of values with defined properties).

properties.title: UnitOfMeasure
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the unit of measure.

stencils.title: DataPropertyConditionMeasure
stencils.description: It checks certain conditions (e.g. states or restriction related to a property) over Data Objects' instances.

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify elements of the ppi extension.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: This attribute is used to describe the element.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: The descriptive name of the measure.

properties.title: Scale
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the measure domain (a set of values with defined properties).

properties.title: UnitOfMeasure
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the unit of measure.

stencils.title: DataMeasure
stencils.description: It measures certain properties contained in a dataObject's instance that this measure is related to

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify elements of the ppi extension.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: This attribute is used to describe the element.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: The descriptive name of the measure.

properties.title: Scale
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the measure domain (a set of values with defined properties).

properties.title: UnitOfMeasure
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the unit of measure.

stencils.title: aggregatedMeasure
stencils.description: It aggregates values of InstanceMeasures contained in the analysis period through an aggregation function

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify elements of the ppi extension.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: This attribute is used to describe the element.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: The descriptive name of the measure.

properties.title: Scale
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the measure domain (a set of values with defined properties).

properties.title: UnitOfMeasure
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the unit of measure.

properties.title: Aggregation Function
properties.description: Function defined through the operators: maximum, minimum, average, sum or count to calculate the aggregated measure value.
properties.tooltip: Choose the operator to calculate the measure value

properties.title: Sampling frequency
properties.description: This attribute defines the frequency of sampling.

stencils.title: TimeAggregatedMeasure
stencils.description: It aggregates values of TimeMeasures contained in the analysis period through an aggregation function

properties.description: This attribute is used to define the aggregation function applied if TimeMeasureType is cyclic.

properties.description: Function defined through the operators: maximum, minimum, average, sum or count to calculate the aggregated measure value.
properties.tooltip: Choose the operator to calculate the measure value

properties.title: Sampling frequency

stencils.title: derivedSingleInstanceMeasure
stencils.description: It is defined as a function of two or more base and/or composed measures

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify elements of the ppi extension.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: This attribute is used to describe the element.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: The descriptive name of the measure.

properties.title: Scale
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the measure domain (a set of values with defined properties).

properties.title: UnitOfMeasure
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the unit of measure.

properties.title: Function
properties.description: The mathematical function used to combine two or more instanceMeasures

stencils.title: DerivedMultiInstanceMeasure
stencils.description: It is defined as a function of two or more ProcessMeasures

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify elements of the ppi extension.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: This attribute is used to describe the element.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: The descriptive name of the measure.

properties.title: Scale
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the measure domain (a set of values with defined properties).

properties.title: UnitOfMeasure
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the unit of measure.

properties.title: Function
properties.description: This attribute describes the mathematical function used to combine the corresponding ProcessMeasures, that allows to calculate the measure value

stencils.title: Time connector
stencils.description: Time connector shows the flowelement that opens or close the measured timed period in a TimeMeasure.

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify the time connector.

properties.title: ConditionType
properties.description: This attribute determines the type of the time connector.

properties.title: When
properties.description: Variable to check the condition at the end of an activity or a pool, if sourceShape is a countMeasure and targetShape is an activity or a pool

properties.title: State
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the state the element must be in to be measured.

stencils.title: AppliesToElement
stencils.description: Defines the connection of the PPI to the BPMN flowelement, in the case of CountMeasure or StateConditionMeasure

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify PPI extension elements.

properties.title: When
properties.description: Variable to check the condition at the end of an activity or a pool, if sourceShape is a countMeasure and targetShape is an activity or a pool

properties.title: State
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the state the element must be in to be measured.

stencils.title: AppliesToData
stencils.description: Defines the connection of the PPI to the BPMN flowelement, in the case of DataPropertyConditionMeasure or DataMeasure

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify PPI extension elements.

properties.title: Restriction
properties.description: This attribute is used to specify the restriction certain Data property must fulfill.

properties.title: State
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the state the element must be in to be measured.

properties.title: DataContentSelection
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the specific part of the data object that has to be measured.

stencils.title: Aggregates
stencils.description: Defines the connection of the AggregatedMeasure to the measure derivedSingleInstanceMeasure or baseMeasure

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify PPI extension elements.

stencils.title: IsGroupedBy
stencils.description: Connects to the element whose condition is used to group an AggregatedMeasure.

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify PPI extension elements.

properties.title: DataContentSelection
properties.description: This attribute is used to define the specific part of the data object that has to be measured.

stencils.title: Uses
stencils.description: Defines the connection of a DerivedMeasure with the base or aggergatedMeasures that combines in its function.

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This attribute is used to uniquely identify PPI extension elements.

properties.title: Variable
properties.description: This attribute defines the variable with which the measure that is target of this connector is defined in the corresponding function.
